## Quiz 2 Review { .smaller }

Vote on questions you want to cover today [here](https://goo.gl/forms/CAXOUGZ7P6AgzDvr2).

- Extra office hours: 10-2pm on Monday 11/12.
- Review Session 1010-12pm on Wednesday 11/14 in Terrell Library Study Room 1AA (Ground Floor).
- There will be 44 questions.
- The material is __not__ cumulative. It includes the following topics:
  - elasticity (modules 9,11)
  - market efficiency (module 12)
  - price and quantity regulation (modules 13, 14, 15)
  - trade (modules 4, 16, 17)
  - competitive markets (modules 24, 25, 26, 27)
  - monopoly (modules 28, 29, 30)
  - oligopoly (module 31)
